name: Myrmex Speaker
movement: 40 ft. walking, burrowing, and climbing speed
description: The Myrmex Speaker is a large elemental creature with a strong connection to earth and stone. It has an imposing presence and showcases its nature-oriented demeanor in its abilities and behavior.
memorable: The Myrmex Speaker can manipulate the battlefield through earth manipulation and has powerful psychic abilities.
goals: To support allies and control the battlefield effectively.
relations: May associate with other earth elementals or creatures connected to nature.
environment: Typically found in rocky or earthy terrains.
strengths: High physical attributes in Strength and Constitution; immunity to exhaustion and paralysis; versatile in combat with multiple special abilities.
weaknesses: Low Charisma, making social interactions challenging.
attacks: Performs three effective Bite attacks, dealing both piercing and poison damage; can also push enemies and create a wall of earth.
most_powerful_ability: Static Barrage, which deals psychic damage to multiple foes at once.
senses: Relies on blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Has an average perception allowing it to detect hidden creatures or objects.
additional_information: Elemental Nature negates the need for air, food, drink, or sleep.
Keen Smell grants advantage on perception checks relying on smell.
Stone Walk allows movement through difficult terrain without penalties.
Earth Manipulation creates permanent changes to the environment.
Can communicate through telepathy within 120 feet.
spellcasting: Can create a Wall of Earth and use abilities that involve strategic battlefield control.
test_queries: creature that manipulates the terrain and communicates telepathically
battlefield controller with powerful psychic attacks
